EmailTemplate.name: WP - TY/WP Offer
EmailTemplate.subject: Your VMTurbo 30 Day Trial Offer: Experience True Control
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header>
Thank you for downloading! You're on your way to enlightenment. That whitepaper you just downloaded is almost guaranteed to increase your IQ, but why let the learning stop there? Check out some of our other resources below, we're sure you'll find something to tickle your fancy. Whitepaper: Cloud Mechanics: Delivering Performance in Shared Environments <http://vmturbo.com/expedient-cloud-mechanics-delivering-performance?http://vmturbo.com/downloads/vmturbo-virtual-health-monitor?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=ty_wp_offer> Expedient Data Centers <http://www.expedient.com/>, a leader in Managed and Data Center Services with locations from Cleveland to Memphis to Boston, unpacks the mechanics of how it consistently meets Service Level Agreements for its customers. Case Study: Canon U.S.A. Fully Automates vMotion and Storage vMotion with VMTurbo <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/VMTurbo-Canon-USA-Success-Story-FINAL1.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=ty_wp_offer> With VMTurbo, Canon U.S.A. was able to utilzie their existing hardware to the fullest extentand drastically reduce resource contention. Webcast: Transforming IT Infrastructure for the Cloud Age <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-opensky-vdi-orchestration?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=ty_wp_offer> Hear directly from OpenSky, trusted advisors to the Fortune 500, on how they delivered 1600% growth – with zero downtime – to their client, and how you can do the same. Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
